title: 如果你有更新过mc，你有发现有什么不一样吗?
author: rickky2
txt_content:
就是声音，其实这是几天前的更新，忘了说
在两天前Minecraft1.8更新过声音

The "Sound Update"
November 13, 2011
This update brought additional and changes to sounds within the /.minecraft/resources folder; the client was not updated.Sounds implemented in all versions:New Explosion sounds  爆炸声音New Door, Fence Gate and Trapdoor sounds  门声音New Bow shooting sounds 弓声音Proper Fishing Pole sounds 鱼竿声音Proper Experience Orb sounds 经验宝珠声音Proper Chest sounds 箱子声音
Sounds implemented in Minecraft 1.0RC2 and beyond:下面是1.0增加的声音New arrow hit sounds  箭声音New Player damage sounds 伤害声音Proper Enderman sounds 小黑声音Sounds for Blaze 火焰怪的声音Sounds for Magma Cubes 地狱史莱姆声音Sounds for Silverfish 银鱼声音

replies.author: mayichong
replies.txt_content: 发现很多，就是不知道摔下去的声音， 因为一直用创建模式玩得

replies.author: makex41
replies.txt_content: 我还是更喜欢原来的声音，尤其是门的……现在好刺耳

replies.author: jameshua
replies.txt_content: 现在的怪物声音变大了，老远就能听见
